long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swipe Fighter Heroes is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension. 
Swipe Fighter Heroes is an exciting online fighting game where players can engage in intense battles using a variety of fighting styles. The game features eight unique arenas inspired by real-world locations, allowing players to immerse themselves in diverse environments.

Players can choose from different fighting techniques, including karate, wrestling, and ninja moves, and use defensive gear to protect themselves from their opponents. As players progress, they can level up their fighters, upgrade their moves, and collect powerful weapons to become the ultimate swipe fighter hero.

Swipe Fighter Heroes offers a thrilling and challenging gameplay experience, perfect for fans of fighting games. You can play it for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.
*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
